title: Product Details Group Content - Ultimate Spark Sport
description: Ultimate Spark Sport product details group content

fields.fieldValue: How do I activate Spark Sport?

Once you’ve added Spark Sport to your Spark Account, you’ll need to activate it. We’ll send you a notification once you’re Spark Sport has been processed and is ready for activation. The link in this notification will take you to the Spark Sport website to sign in with an existing account or create a new account. Alternatively, you can begin the Activation of your Spark Sport in MySpark.
